content:
User: Prompt Overload: Asking for a “BIG IDEA” plus an immediate implementation plan in one go might’ve been a lot to chew on, especially if your prompt had multiple parts or dense details. It could’ve overwhelmed my processing capacity.

Grok: Network Glitch: If there was a blip in your internet connection (or mine on the backend), the response might’ve gotten lost in transit before it ever reached you.
